Html:
OST Recovery Tool uses powerful and technologically advanced algorithms through which it completely scans inaccessible Exchange OST files and extracts the whole email database and save recovered files into accessible PST data files.

Features:
*Repairs and Converts damaged OST
*Find & Save Individual Mail Message as EML or MSG
*Preview of Mail Objects
*Convert OST to PST File
*Safe and Risk-Free OST Conversion
*Save Converted File at Desired Location
*24 x 7 Support
*It works on OST file versions-5.0/5.5/2000/2003/2007/2010 and 2013.
Free Download:- http://www.pcrecoveryutility.com/ost-recovery-tool.html
